quotes.quote: A battle doesn't end when the enemy has won, it ends when you give up.
It's not what happens to us, that matters. Its the way how you react to it that does.
The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
A name doesn't divine a person, there acts do.
Those we love don't go away, they walk beside us everyday, unseen unheard but always near, still loved, still missed and very dear.
If no one comes from the future to stop you from doing it then how bad of a decision can it really be.
Accept what is, let go of what was, and have faith in what will be.

projects.subTitle: This beautifully designed website.
projects.description: Speaks for itself, my personal website (aka this one) build with NextJS and written in TypeScript
